text:
="preserve">Shas, Hebrew: ש״ס, full name: Shomrei Sfarad, Hebrew: שומרי ספרד, meaning "(Religious) guardians of the Sephardim", is an Israeli political party.
Its ideology is left-wing conservative, Sephardic-Mizrahic Ultra-Orthodox, and Religious Zionist.
Political leader is Aryeh Deri.
Shas was founded in 1984.
Number of seats in the 23rd Knesset: 9 (/).
Participating in the Fifth Netanyahu Government.
